Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style patterned pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with two bands in faded added white; exterior: possibly bottom of double saw-edged metope pattern above streaky brown band; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0920) (phase 2)
